text: vahee hai jisane aakaashon aur dharatee ko chhah dinon mein paida kiya - usaka sinhaasan paanee par tha - taaki vah tumhaaree pareeksha le ki tumamen karm kee spasht se kaun sabase achchha hai. aur yadi tum kaho ki "marane ke pashchaat tum avashy uthoge." to jinhen inakaar hai, ve kahane lagenge, "yah to khula jaadoo hai.
